title: i got a free tsm icon  with the msg saying ty
body: its the 2013 icon why did I get this cant find info

replies.body: Per the [status ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-), we enabled toast notifications on the updated client so you're seeing a backlog of old notices.  The tsm icon was[ accidentally gifted ](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5eejd4/riot_gifted_me_a_tsm_icon/)out to some players a while back.  Sorry for the confusion!
